abstract: General Electric has injected $9.5 billion in capital leftover from a stock sale last year into its finance unit, in an effort to improve GE Capital’s ratios ahead of a credit rating review, Chief Financial Officer Keith Sherin said on Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: General Electric has injected $9.5 billion in capital leftover from a stock sale last year into its finance unit, in an effort to improve GE Capital’s ratios ahead of a credit rating review, Chief Financial Officer Keith Sherin said on Tuesday.

headline.main: G.E. Injects $9.5 Billion into Finance Arm
